vocabulary.definition: to transfer pollen from one flower to another to fertilize plants
vocabulary.example: Bees play a crucial role in pollinating flowers and crops.

vocabulary.definition: increasing or growing at a very fast rate
vocabulary.example: The population of rabbits in the area grew exponentially due to the lack of predators.

vocabulary.definition: a type of insecticide that affects the nervous system of insects
vocabulary.example: Farmers should be cautious when using neonicotinoids to avoid harming bee populations.

vocabulary.definition: the cultivation of a single crop in a large area
vocabulary.example: The extensive use of monocultures in farming can lead to soil depletion and increased pest vulnerability.
